Class Gradient

java.lang.Object
net.pl3x.guithium.api.Keyed

net.pl3x.guithium.api.gui.element.Gradient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Element, JsonSerializable
public class Gradient extends Rect
Represents a gradient filled rectangle.

      Creates a new gradient filled rectangle.
      Parameters:
      key - Unique identifier for element
      pos - Position of element
      anchor - Anchor for element
      offset - Offset of element
      size - Size of element
      colorTopLeft - Top left color
      colorTopRight - Top right color
      colorBottomLeft - Bottom left color
      colorBottomRight - Bottom right color
